li.label: ate wood
li.description: I had to eat wood. I know it keeps you alive, but nobody wants to go back to our primal ways.

li.label: my horn stolen
li.description: The colony stole my horn from me! How am I supposed to live like this, disfigured and defenseless?!

li.label: colonist's horn harvested
li.description: Someone took the horn of one of our thrumkin. It's horrible, stealing something so important to their race.

li.label: thrumkin's horn harvested
li.description: Someone took the horn of a thrumkin. It's horrible, stealing something so important to their race.
